Html:
Hello and thanks for making this open source.  I am new to WPF and thought this would be an awesome project to learn with.  When I try to open the project in Visual Studio 2008 (full version), I get the following error: "the source control provider associated with this solution could not be found.  the projects will be treated as not under source control.  Do you want to permanently remove the source control bindings from the projects?"  I choose "No."  Does anyone have more information regarding this as I have no clue - like I said, just learning and playing around.  Many thanks in advance,

 

Drew

We use Visual Studio Team System which has integrated source control with Codeplex.  The dialog is related to that.  It should be ignorable.  If you click "Yes" and save the changes it should stop showing up.
